fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Twist the ground surrounding two different players, granting them both Powerful defense.
- Stomp on the ground, creating a massive earthquake around a player's house. Anyone who visits this target will be swallowed in earth, blackmailing them and preventing them from using abilities until someone visits them. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are capable of self-targeting.
- If you use your earthquake, you may target as many people as you have uses left. Any uses you use that night will be refunded if you do not swallow anyone.
